title: One-skillet Bean & Broccoli Rabe Supper
summary: One-skillet Bean & Broccoli Rabe Supper is a dairy free recipe with 4 servings. For $1.42 per serving, this recipe covers 25% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains roughly 21g of protein, 17g of fat, and a total of 361 calories. If you have pepper, eggs, pork sausage links, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. A couple people really liked this side dish. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 28 hours and 10 minutes. 12 people found this recipe to be flavorful and satisfying. With a spoonacular score of 76%, this dish is good. Similar recipes are Broccoli Rabe Skillet Pizza, Skillet Ravioli With Broccoli Rabe Recipe, and Skillet Orecchiette with Sausage and Broccoli Rabe.
